title: Drawing, "Five Studies of Ceiling with Grotesques; Madonna", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Recto: five studies of ceilings; madonna. Verso: two anatomical studies showing toes, in profile and straight view.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Five Studies of Ceiling with Grotesques; Madonna", 1814–18.Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2307.
